com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao

Class ShowtimeDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.ShowtimeDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ShowtimeDao

    @ApplicationScoped
public class ShowtimeDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ShowtimeDao
    The class ShowtimeDaoImpl contains all the methods implementation to query the showtimes table. It contains the basic CRUD methods and additional methods that were needed. This class implements the ShowtimeDao interface
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
